title: Finance Dashboard
description: This project provides a terminal-like data and information about the shares of publicly traded companies in real-time.

title: Shop Floor Web App
description: Application designed to provide digitization of the shop floor process.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: App that allows users to see the weather forecast for cities of their choosing.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This application will take in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generate an HTML webpage using Node.js command-line application, that displays summaries for each person.

title: Password Generator
description: App that an employee can use to generate a random password based on criteria they've selected.

title: Code Quiz
description: Timed, multiple-choice app quiz that can keep track of high scores and quiz-takers' initials.
